name: Spaceball!
description: Did you ever wonder what sports would be like on the moon? This dynamic multiplayer game will have you on the edge of your seat for hours to come! Mixing elements on Rugby with the low gravity of the moon, you can work as a team to score goals against your opponents. Why not verse your friends and become a Spaceball! champion? This game includes a spaceball arena, offline play with bots, and the creating and joining of online rooms. This game currently includes one arena, two playable characters and access to our online servers.
